column5: has anyone stayed at hidden river lodge on whitefish lake. is it worth the trip or is there a better place in that area

That lake can be tough.  In the immediate area Camp Anjigami is good:  http://www.campanjigami.com/  A little further down 101 towards Chapleau, Happy Day Lodge on Windermere Lake is great:  http://www.happydaylodge.com/
